alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 2:45AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Columbia, east central Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 330 AM EST... At 244 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wellborn, or near White Springs, moving northeast at 45 mph. Radar was detecting some rotation with this storm. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... White Springs, Wellborn, Winfield, Suwannee Valley and Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST for northern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
